DOC.criteria: Diagnosed hay fever , rhinitis nasal and/or eye allergy display symptom sneeze , itch , watery eye , nasal congestion , nasal eye allergy symptom past 12 month OR take medication hay fever , rhinitis , nasal eye allergies 5 year age old Have telephone If less 18 year old adult available knowledgeable participant 's health
